parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account. You do not need to specify this parameter because this parameter will be removed in the future.

parameters.name: Endpoint.IP
parameters.description:
The IP address of the database.

>  You must specify the IP address only if the **Endpoint.InstanceType** parameter is set to **Express**.

parameters.name: Endpoint.InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the ECS instance or the virtual private cloud (VPC).

> 
*   If the **Endpoint.InstanceType** parameter is set to **ECS**, you must specify the ID of the ECS instance.
*   If the **Endpoint.InstanceType** parameter is set to **Express**, you must specify the ID of the VPC.

parameters.name: Endpoint.InstanceType
parameters.description:
The instance type of the database. Valid values:

*   **LocalInstance**: self-managed database with a public IP address
*   **ECS**: self-managed database that is hosted on ECS
*   **Express**: self-managed database that is connected over Express Connect

parameters.name: Endpoint.Port
parameters.description: The service port number of the database.

parameters.name: Endpoint.Type
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to update the connection settings of the source instance or the destination instance. Valid values:

*   **Source**
*   **Destination**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the data synchronization instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: SourceEndpoint.OwnerID
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the source instance belongs. You must specify this parameter only if the source instance and the destination instance belong to different Alibaba Cloud accounts.

parameters.name: SourceEndpoint.Role
parameters.description:
The authorized Resource Access Management (RAM) role of the source instance. You must specify the RAM role only if the source instance and the destination instance belong to different Alibaba Cloud accounts. You can use the RAM role to allow the Alibaba Cloud account that owns the destination instance to access the source instance.

>  For information about the permissions and authorization methods of the RAM role, see [Configure RAM authorization for cross-account data migration and synchronization](~~48468~~).

parameters.name: SynchronizationDirection
parameters.description:
The synchronization direction. Valid values:

*   **Forward**
*   **Reverse**

>  Default value: **Forward**.

The value **Reverse** takes effect only if the topology of the data synchronization instance is two-way synchronization.

parameters.name: SynchronizationJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data synchronization instance. You can call the DescribeSynchronizationJobs operation to query the instance ID.
